article_title: Woodbridge Foam, WNA American Plastics get tax breaks for additons that add 123 jobs

article_metadata.description: A pair of companies investing and adding new jobs in Chattanooga drew property tax breaks Friday, but questions were raised about the need for the inducements and the transparency of negotiations over them.

og.description: A pair of companies investing and adding new jobs in Chattanooga drew property tax breaks Friday, but questions were raised about the need for the inducements and the transparency of negotiations over them.
